text: "Friend Like Me" is a song from the 1992 Disney movie Aladdin. It was sung by Robin Williams in his role as the Genie. The song is also performed by Will Smith in the remake. Many critics believed that the song was the best part of the movie. It was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Original Song at the 65th Academy Awards and the Golden Globe Award for Best Original Song at the 50th Golden Globe Awards in 1993. ==Charts== Will Smith version Chart (2019) Peak position New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) 33 South Korea (Gaon) 96 ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:Ne-Yo songs Category:Will Smith songs
title: Friend Like Me
